vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Another spelling of mits.ra.yim (מִצְרַ֫יִם "Egypt" H4714G)
§ This name is used for:
1) rebellion
1a) rebellion
1b) rebellious (in construct)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   estado de ser rebelde, rebelarse; (b)   rebelde (casa); descripción de Israel
